page.title: 09Manufacturers in Ulverston
page.content: A well established local firm is {Hartley's Brewery}which commenced in 1754. It employs about 100 people and supplies 56 Hartley's public houses and many Free outlets. An{industrial estate}in South Ulver- ston contains medium sized manufactur- ers. It is close to the canal which was the industrial focus of the town in the 19th century. {Ashleys}assemble electrical fittings eg. sockets and lampholders,distribut- ion being via wholesalers. {Acrastyle}designs and manufactures electrical equipment,mainly largescale one-off units for transmission and control,many for export to Arab states and South America. {Cumbria Crystal}manufacture glass- ware to 17th C. patterns using craft skills;the only manufacturer of clear full lead crystal in the country.
